Mild\/Moderate Disabilities Education (7.1: Individualize learning, and provide meaningful and challenging learning experiences for individuals with exceptionalities.
Mild\/Moderate Disabilities Education (7.2: Create safe, inclusive, and culturally responsive learning environments.
Mild\/Moderate Disabilities Education (7.3: Use multiple methods of assessment and data-sources in making educational decisions.
Mild\/Moderate Disabilities Education (7.4: Select, adapt, and use a repertoire of evidence-based instructional strategies to advance learning.
Mild\/Moderate Disabilities Education (7.5: Apply professional and ethical principles to inform practice.
Mild\/Moderate Disabilities Education (7.6: Collaborate with families, schools, and communities to address the needs of individuals with exceptionalities.
